name: Top volunteers
template:
{% set checkins = frappe.db.sql("""SELECT c.name, up.username, ifnull(up.user_image, '/files/logo.png') as profile_thumbnail, c.creation, up.full_name as owner, a.activity_name as chapter, SEC_TO_TIME(SUM(TIME_TO_SEC(hours_spent))) as checkin_count from `tabVol Checkin` c inner join `tabUser` as up on c.user = up.name inner join `tabVol Activity` as a on c.activity = a.name WHERE date(c.creation) > DATE(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 60 DAY)) group by c.user, c.activity order by checkin_count desc limit %(limit)s""", {"limit": limit}, as_dict=True ) %}

{{ title }}

{{ subtitle }}
{% for checkin in checkins %} {% endfor %}
Name Activity Time
{{loop.index}}. {{ checkin.owner.title() }} {{ checkin.chapter }} {{ checkin.checkin_count }}
View more

name: Current Activities
template:
{% set activities = frappe.db.sql(""" select a.activity_name, a.city, a.description, a.start_date, a.status, m.user from `tabVol Activity` a left outer join `tabVolunteer Mapping` as m on a.city = m.city and m.user = %(user)s where (a.city is null or a.city = m.city) and status = %(status)s order by a.start_date desc""", {'status': 'Open', 'user': frappe.session.user}, as_dict=True )%}

{{ title }}

{% for activity in activities %}
{% if activity.city %} {{ activity.city }} {% endif %}
{{activity.activity_name}}

{{activity.description}}

  • {{ frappe.format_date(activity.start_date) }}
View Details
{% endfor %}

name: Past Activities
template:
{% set activities = frappe.db.sql(""" select a.activity_name, a.city, a.description, a.start_date, a.status, m.user from `tabVol Activity` a left join `tabVolunteer Mapping` as m on a.city = m.city and m.user = %(user)s where (a.city = m.city or a.city is null) and status = %(status)s order by a.start_date desc""", {'status': 'Closed', 'user': frappe.session.user}, as_dict=True )%}

{{ title }}

{% for activity in activities %}
{% if activity.city %} {{ activity.city }} {% endif %}
{{activity.activity_name}}

{{activity.description}}

  • {{ frappe.format_date(activity.start_date) }}

{% endfor %}
